<!-- Autogenerated by mlir-tblgen; don't manually edit -->
# 'tensorlist' Dialect
{: .no_toc }


A dialect for implementing TensorFlow's TensorList data structure.


This dialect contains ops that map 1:1 to the corresponding IREE native
module.

This dialect mimics TensorFlow's TensorList op set. It provides a
a straightforward implementation of those semantics.

1. TOC
{:toc}

## Type definition

### tensorlist.list

IREE VM type representing a TensorList.

## Operation definition

### `tensorlist.Concat` (IREE::TensorList::Concat)

Creates a tensor by concatenate the tensors in the tensorlist

Creates a new tensor `tensor` by concatenating the tensors in `list` along
the leading dimension.

Requires the list to be non-empty.
Requires all tensors contained in `list` to have the same dimensions along
the non-leading axes.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`tensor` | buffer_view

### `tensorlist.FromTensor` (IREE::TensorList::FromTensor)

Creates a tensorlist by slicing along the first dimension

The tensor `tensor` will be sliced along its first dimension, resulting in
a tensorlist `list` of length equal to `tensor`'s leading dimension.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`tensor` | buffer_view
`element_shape` | buffer_view

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list

### `tensorlist.GetItem` (IREE::TensorList::GetItem)

Gets an item out of a tensorlist.

Gets an item out of a tensorlist.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list
`index` | buffer_view
`element_shape` | buffer_view

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`item` | buffer_view

### `tensorlist.Reserve` (IREE::TensorList::Reserve)

Create a new tensorlist with a given capacity.

Create a new tensorlist with a given capacity.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`element_shape` | buffer_view
`count` | buffer_view

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list

### `tensorlist.SetItem` (IREE::TensorList::SetItem)

Sets an item of a tensorlist.

Sets an item of a tensorlist, returning a new tensorlist `new_list`
reflecting the updated value. Does not mutate `list`.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list
`index` | buffer_view
`item` | buffer_view

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`new_list` | tensorlist.list

### `tensorlist.Stack` (IREE::TensorList::Stack)

Creates a tensor by stacking the tensors in the tensorlist

Creates a new tensor `tensor` by stacking the tensors in `list`.
The resulting tensor has a leading dimension equal to the length of `list`.

Requires the list to be non-empty.
Requires all tensors contained in `list` to be the same shape.

#### Operands:

| Operand | Description |
| :-----: | ----------- |
`list` | tensorlist.list
`element_shape` | buffer_view
`num_elements` | buffer_view

#### Results:

| Result | Description |
| :----: | ----------- |
`tensor` | buffer_view
